short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lifestyle magazine for chic moms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OneChicMom was born out of wanting to be empowered, and empower other women to pursue their passion, live life to the full, support others and be loved…. Whilst having fun – surely not too much to ask!

The question was therefore ignited and created….. which was “Why can’t us women have it all?”, and if so, where do we find it, and what support is out there?

Our tagline “the ultimate lifestyle magazine for modern moms” aims to encapsulate the ethos and diversity of the magazine, whilst providing useful, interesting, and at times humorous information, that is relevant for the modern mom who leads a busy lifestyle (I would like to include myself at this point if I may!).

Busy balancing one’s hectic work-life balance, time is one thing moms are short of. A one-stop online lifestyle magazine would surely be the answer!!!? – Well, you try finding one! Ergo, the birth of OneChicMom.

Mission Statement

OneChicMom was created to empower women that are making a difference in their life and that of others. We endeavour to personify the ultimate lifestyle magazine for the modern mom, embracing the type of mom that portrays confidence and adopts a chic and elegant style, which resonates with liked-minded moms worldwide.

OneChicMom commits to exploring an intriguing world of individuals, eliciting bespoke services and luxurious products, whilst providing a social interacting network for debates, discussions and wellbeing.

OneChicMom strives to remain totally unique, providing an online magazine which poses a lifestyle to empower all women who are looking for that ‘something different’ to add to their life.
